content.rendered:
Faculty Use:

  • Course Cancellation/Change Form
  • Course Change Request Form
  • New-Course-Approval-Form

If you need the Grade Change Form, please email reg@laverne.edu to request one. For security purposes, we do not allow students access to this form.

 

Faculty/Staff Only: MyDegree Tracker, Student Educational Plan Templates (Should submit as Word document).

  • 2YR Fall Start ADT Sample Template
  • 2YR Spring Start ADT Sample Template
  • 4YR Fall Start Sample Template
  • 4YR Spring Start Sample Template

excerpt.rendered: Faculty Use: Course Cancellation/Change Form Course Change Request Form New-Course-Approval-Form If you need the Grade Change Form, please email reg@laverne.edu to request one. For security purposes, we do not allow students access to this form.   Faculty/Staff Only: MyDegree Tracker, Student Educational Plan Templates (Should submit as Word document). 2YR Fall Start ADT Sample Template […]
